Package.Description: sensenet ECM tool for rebuilding the index for a subtree or the whole Content Repository.

Parameter.name: @startindexingengine
Parameter.description: Whether the indexing engine should be started.

Parameter.name: @path
Parameter.description: Subtree path to rebuild the index for. Default: the whole Content Repository.

Parameter.name: @level
Parameter.description: Optional level of rebuilding the index. Two values are accepted: 'IndexOnly' (default) and 'DatabaseAndIndex'.
